products.title: Titanium Silver Perfect Fit
products.description: This titanium silver perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Perforated Grey Aluminium Perfect Fit
products.description: Perforated slats on aluminium perfect fit blinds shield your room from the full glare of the sun, whilst still allowing you to see out. Designed for high-sunlight rooms such as conservatories, they're a hardwearing blind that provides gentle sun filtering, even when closed struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Battleship Grey Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: You want a black blind, your partner wants white; compromise with this relationship-preserving battleship grey satin style. Organic grey with a mid-gloss sheen, it's an elegant neutral that pairs well with monochrome blinds. As their most hard wearing style, aluminium blinds are ideal for humid and high-traffic spaces struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Grey Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: The shimmering sheen of this grey gloss perfect fit offers a touch of glam to an otherwise neutral hue. Pair with monochromes or pastels for a harmonised interior. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, while the perfect fit clip-on system installs in 15 minutes, no tools required struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the mood and take the edge off the dominant background colour. Turning the guest bedroom into the homely space that your friends and family will never want to leave is all about finding the right balance.

products.title: Splash Blackout Kamanu Marine Roller Blind
products.description: We'd be lying if we said that this splash kamanu marine roller blind wasn't born for bathrooms. Just look at it, it's got aquatic style running all the way through. And the gorgeous fish are just the start. The fabric is 100% waterproof, making it perfect for bathrooms, even rig we'd be lying if we said that this splash kamanu marine roller blind wasn't born for bathrooms.

products.title: Splash Blackout Makrana Mist Roller Blind
products.description: Luxurious and beautiful, the marble effect of this splash makrana mist roller blind is only improved by the fact that it's paired with their 100% waterproof fabric. It's a design born for bathrooms. And glamorous bathrooms at that. We can see this accompanied with white marble ti luxurious and beautiful, the marble effect of this splash makrana mist roller blind is only improved by the fact that it's paired with their 100% waterproof fabric.

products.title: Vermont Metropolitan Grey Mist & Glacier Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: A neutral window dressing doesn't come much more chic than this little beauty. Light and bright wooden slats are presented in a mushroomy grey tone that preserves the natural vibe of the solid basswood they're cut from, offset by a set of decorative tapes in a matching eart a neutral window dressing doesn't come much more chic than this little beauty.

products.title: Vermont Slate & Dusk Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Dark and seriously stylish, this vermont slate & dusk wooden blind takes the timeless appeal of a wooden blind and brings it right up to date. The broody grey slats are deep and dark, contrasting in striking fashion with light or white walls, complemented by light woode dark and seriously stylish, this vermont slate & dusk wooden blind takes the timeless appeal of a wooden blind and brings it right up to date.

products.title: Vermont Cedar Grey & Paloma Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Take a classic blind and drizzle over some serious 21st century chic and what do you get? You get this stunning vermont cedar grey & paloma wooden blind. The smoky grey shade of the slats is the ultimate modern neutral, fitting in anywhere and everywhere, but especially in a take a classic blind and drizzle over some serious 21st century chic and what do you get? You get this stunning vermont cedar grey & paloma wooden blind.

products.title: Metropolitan Grey Mist & Glacier Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: A beautifully soft grey tone, this metropolitan wooden blind is perfect for a contemporary setting. It's shot through with lovely organic grains and we've paired with with a soft fabric tape for a sophisticated look. Offering easy light control this blind is lightweight but h a beautifully soft grey tone, this metropolitan wooden blind is perfect for a contemporary setting.

products.title: Slate & Dusk Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Give your home a modern update with this slate & dusk wooden blind. The strong wooden slats and deep shaded soft tapes offset each other whilst really working into the other one's hands. What's more, the real wood slats are seasoned for extra durability and painted with the give your home a modern update with this slate & dusk wooden blind.

products.title: Luster, Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of luster grey is the way in which it breaks up the traditional single colour fabrics with dashes of white. It gives the whole blind a larger than life quality that lets the light flow around your room without saturating the existing colours. Introducing other finely detailed finishes would be an inspired choice if you want to continue the theme around the room. Look to the natural world for inspiration by focusing on the huge variety of wood grains that you can introduce with your furniture and flooring.

products.title: Aurelia Steel Roman Blind
products.description: This stunning overblown paisley damask design from harlequin brings a luxurious touch to any room. The classic steel colourway makes this design really versatile, looking just as at home in living rooms and bedrooms alike. Let the design do the talking and style with plain wa this stunning overblown paisley damask design from harlequin brings a luxurious touch to any room.

products.title: Quadro Mist Roman Blind
products.description: A modern palette of neutrals, greys and hints of blue, beautifully harmonise together to create a scheme that is cosy and modern. An easy way to showcase your style and personality, the quadro mist roman blind from their harlequin additions range features an intricate square a modern palette of neutrals, greys and hints of blue, beautifully harmonise together to create a scheme that is cosy and modern.

products.title: Tropical Leaves Pebble Roman Blind
products.description: This tropical leaves pebble design brings to life the beauty of costa rica and the caribbean. The ornamental leafy pattern is picked out in a monochromatic palette that highlights each exotic outline. The mix of greys and neutrals is also incredibly easy to incorporate into your this tropical leaves pebble design brings to life the beauty of costa rica and the caribbean.

products.title: Leaf Pewter Roman Blind
products.description: What else would you expect from a design named leaf than, well, a leaf? This design goes big and bold with it, making a huge statement across the fabric - nature is here. And it does it in the most stylish way possible with a light grey background that feels cosy yet also ultr what else would you expect from a design named leaf than, well, a leaf? This design goes big and bold with it, making a huge statement across the fabric - nature is here.

products.title: Splash Tango
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres.
